title: Baderna
text: Baderna is a <a href="village">village</a> in <a href="Istria">Istria</a> region of <a href="Croatia">Croatia</a>. The settlement is administered as a part of the <a href="Pore%C4%8D">City of Poreč</a> and the <a href="Istria%20County">Istria County</a>. According to the 2011 census, the village has 240 inhabitants. It is connected by the <a href="D21%20%28Croatia%29">D21 road</a>.
